analyzed: iha yat uktam kalpanā apoḍham iti tad svarūpa abhidhānataḥ eva vyācaṣṭe nāma jāti ādi kalpanā rahitam
tat akṣam akṣam prati vartate iti pratyakṣam
ādi śabdena guṇa kriyā dravya parigrahaḥ

original: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te 'pi pratibhāserannityādi /
analyzed: na hi arthe śabdāḥ tad ātmānaḥ vā yena tasmin pratibhāsamāne te pi pratibhāseran ityādi
tat iti anena yat nirdiṣṭasya parāmarśaḥ
tatas ca akṣam akṣam prati indriyam indriyam prativartate iti pratyakṣam

original: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti? /
analyzed: yathā indriya sāmarthyāt jñānam utpadyate tathā viṣaya sāmarthyāt api tat kasmāt indriyeṇa eva vyapadeśaḥ na viṣayeṇa iti
asādhāraṇa tvāt indriyasya sādharaṇa tvāt ca arthasya iti
indriyam indriya vijñānasya eva hetuḥ iti asādharaṇam
arthaḥ tu manaḥ vijñānasya api iti sādhāraṇaḥ

original: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
analyzed: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśa pravṛttiḥ yathā bherī śabdaḥ yava aṅkure iti
asādhāraṇa hetu tvāt akṣaiḥ tat yapariśyate ityādi

original: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya /
analyzed: manaḥ vijñāna ādi api pratyakṣam iti uktam na ca tat anena saṃgṛhītam iti katham vyāpi tā lakṣaṇasya
kalpanā apoḍham yat tat jñāna arthe rūpa ādau iti anena artha sākṣātkāri tva grahaṇāt manaḥ vijñāna deḥ api tad avyabhicārāt saṃgṛhītam eva tat mānasam
tat ca liṅgāt artha darśanam āliṅgam punar trirūpam uktam
tasmāt tri rūpāt liṅgāt yat anumeye rthe dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam utpadyate kiṃviśiṣṭam

original: agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti /
analyzed: agniḥ atra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt tat anumānam iti
udāharaṇa dvayam tu vastu sādhana kārya svabhāva ākhya hetu dvaya khyāpana artham
tat eva jñānam pratyakṣa numāna lakṣaṇam
tathā hi pariccheda rūpam eva jñānam utpadyate
na ca paricchedāt ṛte anyat jñānam phalam
iti atra bahu vaktavyam alam prasaṅgena
sarvathā na pratyakṣa anumānābhyām anyat vibhinnam phalam asti iti
tad dhāva abhimatayoḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ phala tvāt
pramāṇa abhāve ca tad phalasya api abhāvaḥ iti

original: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram /
analyzed: sa vyāpāra vat khyāteḥ pramāṇa tvam iti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇena vartate iti sa vyāpāram
sa vyāpāram asyāḥ vidyate iti sa vyāpāravatī
sa vyāpāravatī ca asau khyātiḥ ca sa vyāpāravat khyātiḥ pratītiḥ
tasyāḥ sa vyāpāra vattyāḥ khyāteḥ pramāṇa tvam iti

original: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti /
analyzed: viṣaya ākāram jñānam utpadyamānam viṣayam gṛṇhat eva utpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhaka ākārasya pramāṇa tā iti

original: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate /
analyzed: anye tu san ca asau vyāpāraḥ sat vyāpāraḥ pramāṇa vyavasthā kāri tvāt san iti ucyate

original: so 'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate /
analyzed: sā u syā vidyate iti śeṣam pūrvavat vyācakṣate
kalpanā jñānam artha antare pratyakṣa ābhāsam
etat eva grahaṇa vākyam vyācikhyāsuḥ āha

original: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate /
analyzed: yat jñānam ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabda āropitam utpadyate
tad artha sva lakṣaṇa aviṣaya tvāt
sāmānya lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt iti arthaḥ
hetvābhāsa pūrvakam hetvābhāsa nimittam jñānam anumāna ābhāsam

original: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena /
analyzed: hetvābhāsaḥ hi bahu prakāraḥ uktaḥ asti vādi bhedena

original: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam /
analyzed: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yat anumeye rthe dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddha ādi svarūpa anabhijñasya bhavati tat anumānābhāsam
idānīm ukta śeṣam duṣaṇam abhidhātu kāmaḥ āha

pratyakṣa ādi viruddhā pratijñā iti evamādi
evam dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ sādhana dharma ādi asiddha tvam

original: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tudbhāvanamātrameva /
analyzed: tasya pratyakṣa viruddha hetu ādeḥ prakāśanam prāśnika pratyāyanam na tud bhāvana mātram eva
dūṣaṇam iti sāmānyena dūṣaṇa jāti anatikramāt eka vacanam iti
abhūta sādhana doṣa udbhāvanāni dūṣaṇa ābhāsāni

original: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni /
analyzed: abhūtam avidyamānam eva tat yatas sādhana doṣam sāmānyanā udbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jāti dūṣaṇa ābhāsāni
saṃpūrṇe sādhane avayave nyūna tva vacanam
aduṣṭa pakṣe pakṣa doṣa vacanam ityādi nigada siddham
śāstra parisamāptau tad svarūpa pratipādanāya eva āha
padārtha mātram iti sādhana ādi pada uddeśa mātram
diś mātra siddhaye nyāya diś mātra siddhi artham
yā atra yuktiḥ anvaya vyatireka lakṣaṇā
